text: Naxie meng wo ciyu jingdian de renmen [you jing ren], tamen wei jiang shi ni de jingdian [“gulanjing”] er xinxi, tongmeng zhe [youtai jiaotu he alabo ren de duoshenjiao tu] zhong youren fouren jingdian zhong de yibufen. Ni shuo:“Wo zhi fengming chongbai an la, bu gei ta shezhi huoban. Wo zhi qiqiu ta, wo zhi gui xin ta.”
